# External reference — Agent signals & governance implications

This document is an external analysis used as a reference anchor for how to interpret agent signals
and governance boundaries in human-in-the-loop systems.

Non-normative:
- It does not define repo policy.
- It does not introduce requirements.
- It is used only to support discussion and reduce repeated debates about “signals vs decisions”.

- GOVERNANCE.md (human-in-the-loop signals)
- PROJECT_STATE_PACK.md (closed topics and scope boundaries)
